attributes.action: Take all action possible to close down guantanamo bay and camp x-ray in Cuba
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Guantanamo bay is a prison camp in Cuba where human rights atrocities are carried out by the American government. We ask that the Prime Minister does everything in his power to close down guantanamo bay and show that we the people of Britain do not agree with this activity.
